title: Brightline Florida Mulls $100 Million Debt for Liquidity
description: Brightline, the private rail line between Miami and Orlando, said it’s considering issuing $100 million in additional debt for operations and to pay potential legal claims, according to its latest ridership and revenue report.
content: Brightline, the private rail line between Miami and Orlando, said it’s considering issuing $100 million in additional debt for operations and to pay potential legal claims, according to its latest ridership and revenue report.
